explanation: [0-0] A young man, wearing a black suit and a T-shirt with a tie pattern, sits at a table facing forward. There are three objects on the table: a bottle filled with milky white liquid on the left, a glass with ice cubes in the middle, and a plastic-bagged item on the right. The young man is holding the bottle with his right hand. Behind him is a blue wall.

[0-2] Next, the man turns the bottle filled with milky white liquid upside down in his right hand. Then, he points the opening downwards, pouring a large amount of the liquid out of the bottle. The liquid spills onto the table, splashing everywhere. Immediately afterwards, the man lifts his left arm and taps the bottom of the bottle with his elbow, causing more liquid to flow out. A large amount of the liquid spills onto the table, and some even splashes onto the man's clothes.
